title: JR Watkins Natural Hand and Body Bar Soap, Moisturizing Bath and Shower Soap for Women and Men, Shea Butter, USA Made and Cruelty Free, 8 oz, Aloe & Green Tea
features: NOURISH AND MOISTURIZE: Gently cleanse your skin, pamper it with nutrients, and give it the moisture it needs to thrive. J.R Watkins hand and body bar soap turns every bath into an experience. You’ll love the beautifully balanced scent that leaves you feeling nice & relaxed.

INSPIRED BY NATURE: Give your skin the best with a natural bar soap. We believe in creating high-quality products with ingredients from natural sources. Never have to worry about irritating parabens, dyes, or phthalates; our soap bar is great even for sensitive skin.

LONG LASTING LATHER: A big bar meets a rich lather to create a body and hand bar soap that goes a very long way. Massage the bar soap for women and men into the skin as a body soap or place it by the sink to wash hands. For added hydration, follow with one of our body oil mists.
100% CRUELTY-FREE: J.R Watkins is proudly certified and recognized by Leaping Bunny as a brand that doesn’t test on animals. Get a cleansing bar soap crafted with a conscience.
MADE IN THE USA: Since 1868, right in the USA. That’s 150 years of experience and thousands of satisfied customers.
description: J. R. Watkins Shea Butter, aloe & Green Tea Hand & Body Bar Soap gently cleanses while nourishing and moisturizing skin. Made with Lavender and jojoba oil. Follow with one of our body oil mists for added hydration.
